Fracas is a realtime point cloud music video with photogrammetric flowers.

The video above has a very high bitrate. If you're having trouble loading it, please check out the compressed video on Youtube.

Fracas is a music video for Shawn Bell's Fracas. It explores patterns and biological aesthetics under the eyes of the digital.

Victor Ivanov
V-OS 3198 Days
12754 Hours
